source: TEXT_BANSAH302_01401_SEQ_00<tab>Seww would have you delve deep into the spawning grounds.
target: TEXT_BANSAH302_01401_SEQ_00<tab>ノォヴの育成地のセェウは、冒険者に頼みがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_BANSAH302_01401_SEQ_01<tab>According to Seww, the Coral Tridents have been hard at work perfecting an even more powerful version of their shellfish siege weaponry. He requests that you act immediately to protect the tidegates from the devastating force of these unnatural creations. Delve deep into the spawning grounds, and destroy the reinforced whelk ballistas before they are transported to the front lines.
target: TEXT_BANSAH302_01401_SEQ_01<tab>セェウから、「珊瑚の銛」が完成させた、より強力な攻城兵器を破壊してほしいと依頼を受けた。サプサ産卵地にある「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F209E401 /var>」を2台破壊しよう。

source: TEXT_BANSAH302_01401_SEQ_02<tab>You have successfully destroyed the latest and most powerful versions of the whelk ballistas. Return to Novv's Nursery and report to Seww.
target: TEXT_BANSAH302_01401_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F209E401 /var>を破壊した。ノォヴの育成地の「セェウ」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_BANSAH302_01401_SEQ_03<tab>After hearing your report, a relieved Seww reiterates the importance of the tidegates' function in keeping the warring peoples separate. But though the Coral Tridents have once more been thwarted by your actions, it seems they are intent on strangling themselves with Seww's graphically described chain of retaliation.
target: TEXT_BANSAH302_01401_SEQ_03<tab>セェウに報告すると、彼は被害を抑えられたことに安堵したようだった。強力な兵器がさらなる戦を呼ぶ。この過ちを「珊瑚の銛」はいつまで繰り返すのだろうか……。人とサハギン族の悪しき連鎖を断ち切るため、これからも兵器破壊に協力しよう。
TEXT_BANSAH302_01401_TODO_00<tab>サプサ産卵地の<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F209E401 /var>を破壊

source: TEXT_BANSAH302_01401_SEWW_000_000<tab>Pshhh... There is word that the Coral Tridentshhh have perfected more powerful versions of their unnatural whelk ballishhhtae.
target:
TEXT_BANSAH302_01401_SEWW_000_000フスィーッ……「珊瑚の銛」が、
より強力なバリスタを完成させたらしい。

source: TEXT_BANSAH302_01401_SEWW_000_001<tab>It appears that much effort has been shhhpent in breeding larger, more robushhht shhhellfish─the Tridentshhh mean to take no chances when they next attack the tidegateshhh.
target:
TEXT_BANSAH302_01401_SEWW_000_001……潤沢にエサを与え、肥え太らせたユミール貝から作った、
その名もだっ！
奴らめ、あれを使って防波壁を崩すつもりだろう。

source: TEXT_BANSAH302_01401_SEWW_000_002<tab>Fortunately for ushhh, these unnatural weapons are yet being teshhhted deeper within the shhhpawning grounds. Now is our chance to deshhhtroy them before they can be transhhhported to the front lines!
target:
TEXT_BANSAH302_01401_SEWW_000_002あんなものが前線に投入されたら大変なことになる。
今のうちに、サプサ産卵地の奥にある
「」2基を、ぶっ壊してくれ！

source: TEXT_BANSAH302_01401_SEWW_000_003<tab>Any attack on the ballishhhtae will likely bring shhhwift reprisals, so be ready to defend yourshhhelf against the guards.
target:
TEXT_BANSAH302_01401_SEWW_000_003護衛のサハギン族が、全力で止めにくるだろうから、
くれぐれも注意してくれよ。

source: TEXT_BANSAH302_01401_SEWW_000_004<tab>Thishhh is the perfect opportunity to deshhhtroy these shhhiege weapons before they are brought to bear upon the tidegateshhh! But be wary─the ballishhhtae will not be left unguarded.
target:
TEXT_BANSAH302_01401_SEWW_000_004今のうちに、サプサ産卵地の奥にある
「」2基を、ぶっ壊してくれ！
護衛のサハギン族には注意してくれよ。

source: TEXT_BANSAH302_01401_SEWW_000_010<tab>Pshhh! Another victory for our cause! Shhhould the tidegateshhh fall, there would be no end to our battles with the shhhorewalkers.
target:
TEXT_BANSAH302_01401_SEWW_000_010フスィーッ……よくやってくれたぜ！
防波壁を崩したところで、ヒトとの争いは終わらない。

source: TEXT_BANSAH302_01401_SEWW_000_011<tab>We attack, they counterattack, and the unbroken chain of retaliation pulls more tightly around all our neckshhh. A shhhimple truth, but one that my fanatic kin shhheem unable to grashhhp...
target:
TEXT_BANSAH302_01401_SEWW_000_011攻撃は、より強い反撃を招き、
お互いに被害が増えるだけだってのに……フスィーッ……。
連中め……なぜ、そこまで頭が回らないんだ……。
